headline: 70 applications received for scheme to produce electronic components
description: Sources have said earlier that Tata Electronics, Dixon Technologies, and Foxconn were among the big players that have shown interest.

headline: Adani partners with Sparton to develop anti-submarine warfare solutions
description: The partnership aims to localise the production and assembly of complex electronic sensors, navigation systems, and ASW solutions in India under the ‘Atmanirbhar Bharat’ and ‘Make in India’ initiatives, reducing India’s dependence on imports and foreign OEMs for critical naval technologies

headline: Ola Krutrim Says Employee Who Died By Suicide Was On ‘Personal Leave’
description: As a company, we are heartbroken by this loss, Ola Krutrim says, after Reddit posts claim the employee died by suicide due to “extreme work pressure”.

headline: Mumbai Metro Seeks Extortionate Rent For Providing Mobile Connectivity To Commuters, Says Cellular Operators
IMF imposes 11 new conditions on Pakistan, warns it against risks to bailout programme: Report
description: The Express Tribune report said that the IMF slapped 11 more conditions on Pakistan, taking the total conditions to 50.

headline: Caution is the buzzword in the IPO land
description: Despite a recent resurgence in IPOs, a study of 101 companies listed since January 2024 reveals that most have struggled to maintain their initial listing gains. While a small percentage delivered substantial returns on debut, a significant portion now trade below their listing prices. Only a third of the companies have achieved gains exceeding 25% over their offer price.

headline: Anarock's FY25 Revenue Up 33% On Higher Property Consultancy Fees
description: New Delhi, May 18 (PTI) Real estate consultant Anarock Group revenue grew 33 per cent last fiscal to Rs 755 crore on better demand for residential and commercial properties, it's Chairman Anuj Puri said.

headline: Large Cement Makers Report Volume Growth In Q4, Expect To Continue Momentum In FY26
description: However, they are cautious about the geopolitical tensions and changing trade landscape.

headline: Ahead of Market: 10 things that will decide stock market action on Monday
description: Indian markets ended lower on Friday due to profit booking in financial and IT stocks. Despite the dip, midcaps, smallcaps, and rate-sensitive sectors stayed strong. Optimism remains on easing global tensions and rate cut hopes. US and European markets extended gains, while key Indian stocks saw high activity and buying interest.

headline:
Adani Defence & Aerospace And Sparton Enter Partnership
To Indigenise Anti-Submarine Warfare Solutions
Adani Defence, Sparton Sign Deal To Make Anti-Submarine Sonobuoys In India
description: Adani Defence & Aerospace has signed a binding collaboration agreement with Sparton (DeLeon Springs LLC), a group company of Elbit Systems and a leading provider of advanced Anti-submarine warfare systems.

headline: India Largest Market For Electric Three-Wheelers: IEA
description: The market is highly concentrated, with China and India together accounting for more than 90% of electric and conventional 3W sales.

headline: India's Smartphone Exports Soar, Surpassing Petroleum Products,  Diamonds In FY25
description: The smartphone exports rose by 55% to $24.14 billion in 2024-25 from $15.57 billion in 2023-24 and $10.96 billion in 2022-23.

headline: India Beckons the Musks: Errol to Arrive After Maye’s Visit
description: Visiting India from June 1 to 6, Errol Musk will tour Servotech’s renewable energy facility and explore potential areas of collaboration, with possible meetings lined up with key government ministries

headline: Bitcoin vs USD: Why BTC is yet to catch up to the dollar for global dominance
description: Bitcoin’s rise highlights growing interest in decentralised finance, but it remains far from replacing the US Dollar, which maintains global supremacy due to stability, reach, and economic might. For now, Bitcoin serves as a supplementary asset, not a replacement.

headline: Reverse flipping: The billion-dollar Gharwapsi fueling India’s startup swagger
description: Indian startups are increasingly “reverse flipping” back from foreign jurisdictions due to regulatory reforms, maturing capital markets, and rising investor confidence. This shift reflects India’s growing appeal as a global startup hub with strong domestic support.

headline: Market Trading Guide: Know why BEML, HUDCO are among 5 stock recommendations for Monday
description: Markets dipped Friday on profit booking, but weekly gains held. Analysts suggest buying BEML, Angel One, Signature Global, HUDCO, and Tata Power based on technical breakouts and bullish indicators.

headline: With Nifty50 back above 25,000, May 19 becomes a crucial date for trend confirmation, Says Harshubh Mahesh Shah
description: Nifty rose over 4% as easing India-Pak tensions, falling VIX, FII buying, and US-China trade progress boosted sentiment. Traders eye key levels and dates for direction in the coming week.

headline: U.S. remittance tax plan may hit Indian households, rupee: GTRI
description: It targets international money transfers made by non-U.S. citizens, including green card holders and temporary visa workers like those on H-1B or H-2A visas. The proposed levy will not be applicable to U.S. citizens

headline: These 8 stocks witnessed a rise in prices with volumes in last 3 days
description: Eight BSE 500 stocks saw consistent gains in price, trading, and delivery volumes over three sessions, reflecting rising investor interest. Top performers include Rail Vikas, IRFC, and Data Patterns.

headline: Crompton Greaves, Delhivery among 10 mid-cap stocks analysts expect to rally up to 53%
description: Brokerages remain bullish on select BSE Midcap stocks, forecasting up to 53% upside. Top analyst-rated picks include Oil India, Crompton Greaves, Emami, and Aurobindo Pharma. Backed by strong fundamentals and positive sentiment, these stocks span multiple sectors, reflecting broader investor optimism in India's mid-cap segment.

headline: These 10 penny stocks rally 20-30% in a week
description: 10 penny stocks surged 20–30% weekly as Sensex rose; picks met criteria on price, volume, and market cap.

headline: Understanding high dividend yield stocks
description: High dividend yield stocks offer steady income and low volatility but may face risks like dividend cuts and limited growth potential.

headline: How to understand Debt to Equity Ratio: A must-know guide for investors
description: Debt to Equity ratio gauges a company’s financial leverage, showing reliance on debt versus equity for funding assets and operations.

headline: F&O Talk | Market mood lifts, Nifty to eye 24,740  as immediate target: Rahul Ghose
description: India’s stock market rebounded strongly, with Nifty crossing 25,000, boosted by geopolitical peace and the US-China trade deal. Analysts see further gains but advise selectivity. Defence, metals, and banking sectors show promise. Key stocks include HAL, Tata Steel, and ICICI Bank, amid mixed earnings and cautious optimism.

headline: Zen Technologies Q4 results: PAT jumps 189% YoY to Rs 101 crore, dividend declared at Rs 2 per share
description: Zen Technologies reported a 189% YoY profit surge to Rs 101.04 crore in Q4 FY25, with revenue rising 130%. Strong EBITDA margins, strategic investments in Vector Technics and the US market, and a proposed Rs 2/share dividend boosted sentiment. Shares hit a 5% upper circuit.

headline: India Hits $770 Million In Imports From Bangladesh With Port Restrictions
Sebi mandates e-book mechanism for pvt debt securities above Rs 20 cr
description: Markets regulator Sebi has made the electronic book mechanism mandatory for all private placement debt issues of Rs 20 crore or above and expanded the platform's scope to include REITs and InvITs.

headline: Indian cosmetics brand Colorbar eyes IPO in early 2027
description: India's Colorbar Cosmetics is planning to go public in early 2027, after doubling its revenue this financial year by upgrading its designs, launching new products and opening more stores, the makeup and skincare brand's top boss told Reuters.

headline: Sebi simplifies operational process of cash flow disclosure in corp bond database
description: Markets regulator Sebi has simplified the operational process and provided clarity on cash flow disclosure in the corporate bond database after a review of the Request for Quote (RFQ) Platform framework.

headline: Market valuation of 9 of top 10 firms jumps Rs 3.35 lakh cr; Reliance biggest winner
description: Nine of the top 10 valued firms added Rs 3.35 lakh crore in their market valuation last week in tandem with a positive trend in equities, led by Reliance Industries. HDFC Bank, Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), ICICI Bank, State Bank of India, Infosys, Bajaj Finance, Hindustan Unilever and ITC were the gainers among the top 10 companies. Bharti Airtel was the only laggard.

headline: Q4 results this week: ITC, Sun Pharma, IndusInd Bank, IndiGo, BEL among 81 companies set to announce earnings
description: India Inc's Q4 earnings season intensifies with 81 firms, including ITC, Sun Pharma, ONGC, and Hindalco, set to report this week, offering insights into sectoral performance and future growth outlooks.

headline: Turkey’s Celebi loses over Rs 2,500 crore in 2 days as stock crashes 20% after India revokes security clearance
description: Celebi Hava lost over Rs 2,500 crore in market value after India revoked security clearance citing national security. The company is pursuing legal remedies while denying political links and emphasizing its Indian operations.

headline: IPO Calendar: Belrise Industries lead 4 IPOs that will rev up primary market next week
description: Four IPOs will hit the Indian markets next week, led by mainboard offerings from Belrise Industries and Borana Weaves. Two SME firms—Unified Data-Tech Solutions and Dar Credit—will also launch issues, aiming to raise capital for expansion, debt repayment, and operations amid renewed investor interest.

headline: FPIs pump Rs 18,620 cr in equities in May on global tailwinds, improving domestic fundamentals
description: Foreign investors continue to show confidence in the country's equity market, infusing Rs 18,620 crore so far this month, driven by a combination of global tailwinds and improving domestic fundamentals.

headline: Mind Over Money: Shaji Varghese on discipline, purpose, and wellness: 5 lessons from 3 dozen marathons
description: Shaji Varghese, Muthoot FinCorp CEO, blends marathon running with leadership, emphasizing discipline, wellness, and continuous growth to inspire both personal and organizational excellence across fitness, business, and learning.

headline: Breakout Stocks: How to trade Mazagon Dock, Bharat Dynamics & Bharat Electronics that hit fresh 52-week high?
description: Markets closed lower Friday; analysts suggest buying Mazagon Dock, BEL, and BDL on dips despite overbought technical indicators.

headline: BSE, LTIM among 14 companies to approach record date for dividend, split, bonus, rights issue next week
description: Multiple corporate actions this week include dividends, stock split, bonus and rights issues—investors must track record dates for eligibility.

headline: Trump Says Walmart Shouldn’t Blame Tariffs for Higher Prices
description: Walmart announced another quarter of solid sales and earnings growth, but cautioned that tariffs and increasing economic turbulence means even the world’s largest retailer expects to raise prices.

headline: India-US trade deal, Q4 results among 6 factors likely to impact D-St activity this week
description: The Indian equity market experienced a significant rally, closing above 25,000 and recovering losses since October 2024, fueled by Operation Sindoor and positive market sentiment. Investors are closely watching corporate earnings, potential progress on the India-US trade deal, and foreign capital flows.

headline: Nifty's 25K breakout has more legs, smallcaps signal risk-on mood: Geojit's Anand James
description: Nifty's breakout above 25,000 signals strong momentum, though many stocks remain below past peaks. Smallcaps show broad strength, defence stocks may see short-term fatigue, and banking looks bullish on strong cues. Stock-specific moves in Adani Green and Jindal Steel are favored, while IT may undergo consolidation before the next rally.

headline: IPO Tracker: Belrise And Borona Among Maiden Issues To Hit The Streets
description: Two mainboard and three SMEs to open in the coming week.

headline: Allied Blenders Targets 15% Ebitda Margin By FY27, Bets On Capex, Premiumisation
description: The company is also targeting topline growth of over 15% in value terms by FY27.

headline: Eight Money Myths That Stop Middle Class From Creating Wealth
description: Many middle-class families believe that diligently saving money in bank accounts is enough to build wealth.

headline: Asian Economic Data, Grasim, ITC Q4 Earnings, Belrise Industries IPO — The Week Ahead
description: The spotlight will be on the key macro, trade and industrial data coming in from Asia that will provide markets a glimpse of the disruption that Trump's tariffs have caused.

headline: PNG Jewellers Targets 27–30% Value Growth In FY26
description: CMD Saurabh Gadgil highlighted that sentiment for the industry remains strong, with no significant selling pressure despite high prices.

headline: Medanta Owner Global Health Plans Rs 4,000-Crore Capex To Reach 6,000 Beds
description: The healthcare firm remains focused on volume-driven, value-based growth, with increasing bed occupancy and conservative tariff hikes.

headline: ITR: Your Ultimate Guide To Saving Tax — Follow These 8 Steps
description: If you have several deductions to claim, choosing the old tax regime could be helpful to save more on your total income tax amount.

headline: Rs 26 lakh crore richer in a week! What should stock market investors do now?
description: Markets soared as geopolitical relief, soft inflation, and strong FII flows lifted Sensex and Nifty sharply. Broader gains in midcaps, defence, and infrastructure fuelled optimism, though experts warn of valuation risks and advise caution amid expensive mid- and small-cap levels.

headline: ????Butter from air, virtual trial rooms and more…
description: A Sunny Side Up edition where we talk about butter from greenhouse gases, virtual mirror trial rooms and more.
